description: Update an answer related content link.
permissions: Only admin users can update answer related content links (user.is_admin?).
side_effects: Updates the answer and/or related content relationships for an answer_related_content link.
validation_notes: At least one of --answer or the --related-content-type/--related-content-id pair must be provided; otherwise the update is rejected. If --answer is provided it cannot be empty. If either --related-content-type or --related-content-id is provided, both are required together. related-content-type accepts newsletters, glossary-terms, release-notes, press-releases, objectives, features, questions, or class names like GlossaryTerm (CLI normalizes singular/plural and class-name variants). The related content must be a Newsletter, GlossaryTerm, ReleaseNote, PressRelease, Objective, Feature, or Question.

flags.name: --related-content-type
flags.validation: Must be provided together with --related-content-id. Accepts newsletters, glossary-terms, release-notes, press-releases, objectives, features, questions; also accepts class names like GlossaryTerm.
